item.title: 中国对人工智能的狂热掩盖了更加黯淡的技术现实

That euphoria may be misplaced.】

item.title: 英特尔接近以 16 亿美元收购人工智能芯片初创公司 SambaNova
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英特尔公司正在就收购人工智能芯片初创公司SambaNova Systems Inc.进行深入谈判，包括债务在内的收购价格约为16亿美元。【原文：Intel Corp. is in advanced talks to acquire artificial intelligence chip startup SambaNova Systems Inc. for about $1.6 billion including debt, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 索玛希望通过合并创建价值 120 亿美元的航运技术公司
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Thoma Bravo 正在洽谈将其航运软件公司 Auctane Inc.【原文：Thoma Bravo is in talks to merge its shipping software firm Auctane Inc., formerly known as Stamps.com, with third-party logistics provider WWEX Group to form a business that could be worth as much as $12 billion, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: Azul 航空公司重组计划获美国法院批准
item.description: 巴西航空公司Azul SA获得美国法院批准，退出破产程序并实施债权人支持的重组，以削减债务，并获得美国联合航空公司控股公司和美国航空集团公司的新投资。【原文：Brazilian airline Azul SA won US court permission to exit bankruptcy and implement a creditor-backed restructuring that trims debt and lines up new investment from United Airlines Holdings Inc. and American Airlines Group Inc.】

item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：Apollo Global Management Inc. is giving its finance chief and top lawyer retention bonuses totaling $23.5 million.】

item.title: 派拉蒙 540 亿美元债务成为华纳竞购的主角
item.description: 即使派拉蒙天舞公司能够违背华纳兄弟发现公司的意愿接管该公司，它还面临着另一个高难度的障碍：应对它计划承担的 540 亿美元的巨额债务。【原文：Even if Paramount Skydance Corp. manages to take over Warner Bros. Discovery Inc. against the company’s will, it faces another high hurdle: coping with the colossal $54 billion of debt it’s planning to take on.】

item.title: 魁北克 Troilus 矿业公司将为黄金项目供电
item.description: 根据一位省议员公布的一份文件，Troilus Mining Corp. 达成了一项协议，可以帮助这家处于发展阶段的公司获得重启魁北克金矿所需的电力供应。【原文：Troilus Mining Corp. landed a deal that could help supply the development-stage firm with the electricity needed to restart a Quebec gold mine, according to a document released by a provincial lawmaker.】

item.title: 幽灵油轮停靠委内瑞拉，显示美国面临挑战
item.description: 两艘所谓的 "幽灵油轮 "目前正在委内瑞拉海岸附近装货，这凸显了特朗普政府在试图破坏这个南美国家主要收入来源的出口时所面临的挑战。【原文：Two so-called ghost oil ships are currently loading off the coast of Venezuela, highlighting the challenges the Trump administration faces trying to disrupt exports of the South American country’s primary source of revenue.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》称，特朗普提名沃什和哈塞特为美联储主席头号竞争者
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示，凯文-哈塞特和凯文-沃什是他领导美国联邦储备委员会的首选，他希望下一任央行主席能就利率问题与他协商。【原文：President Donald Trump said that Kevin Hassett and Kevin Warsh are his top choices to lead the US Federal Reserve and that he expects the next chair of the central bank to consult with him on interest rates.】

item.title: 萨克斯称中国 "拒绝 "H200战机，超越美国战略
item.description: 白宫人工智能沙皇大卫-萨克斯（David Sacks）援引新闻报道称，中国已经摸清了美国允许其购买英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：China has figured out the US strategy for allowing it to buy Nvidia Corp.’s H200 and is rejecting the AI chip in favor of domestically developed semiconductors, White House AI czar David Sacks said, citing news reports.】

item.title: 澳大利亚锂矿公司 Ioneer 有意竞购里约的美国硼部门
item.description: 据澳大利亚矿业公司Ioneer Ltd.的高层管理人员透露，该公司有意竞购力拓集团在美国的一系列资产，这些资产主要生产化肥中使用的一种重要矿物--硼。【原文：Australian mining firm Ioneer Ltd. is interested in bidding on a bundle of Rio Tinto Group’s US assets that produce boron, a critical mineral used in fertilizer, according to its top executive.】

item.title: 美国寻求阻止诺姆就委内瑞拉驱逐问题举行藐视法庭听证会
item.description: 特朗普政府敦促上诉法院阻止法官就国土安全部部长克里斯蒂-诺姆（Kristi Noem）等人驱逐两飞机被指控的委内瑞拉帮派成员是否藐视法庭举行听证会。【原文：The Trump administration urged an appeals court to block a judge from holding hearings on whether Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem and others were in contempt of court by deporting two plane loads of alleged Venezuelan gang members.】

item.title: 利差扩大，债务风险加剧，甲骨文债券交易宛如垃圾股
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）的新投资级票据现在的交易更像是垃圾债券，因为一些数据中心的完工日期推迟，加剧了人们对其人工智能投资利润的担忧。【原文：Oracle Corp.’s new investment-grade notes are now trading more like junk bonds, as delays on the completion dates for some data centers add to fears about profits from its artificial intelligence investments.】

item.title: First Brands 旨在通过追逐被套牢的资金向贷款人提供保证
item.description: First Brands 的顾问在其 11 亿美元的救援贷款价值崩溃后，试图安抚胆怯的债权人，称自申请破产保护以来，公司业务已趋于稳定，并着手从目前无法获得的应收账款中释放资金。【原文：First Brands advisers sought to reassure skittish creditors after the value of its $1.1 billion rescue loan collapsed, saying business has stabilized since filing Chapter 11 and moving to unlock funds from receivables it can’t currently access.】

item.title: 非法矿工在秘鲁纽蒙特公司价值 48 亿美元的矿区挖金
item.description: 据一位政府高级官员称，世界上最大的金银生产商拥有的一个价值数十亿美元的黄金项目在秘鲁北部遭到非法挖掘者的入侵。【原文：A multi-billion-dollar gold project owned by the world’s biggest bullion producer has been invaded by illegal diggers in northern Peru, according to a top government official.】

item.title: 加拿大空军斥资 5.47 亿美元购买六架庞巴迪喷气机
item.description: 加拿大皇家空军向庞巴迪公司订购了六架 Global 6500 飞机，价值约 7.53 亿加元（5.47 亿美元），用于执行多功能任务。【原文：The Royal Canadian Air Force ordered six Global 6500 aircraft from Bombardier Inc. in a deal valued at about C$753 million ($547 million) for multi-role missions.】

item.title: 萨克斯的不良债务在付息截止日期前跌至低点
item.description: 最近几天，萨克斯全球企业（Saks Global Enterprises）的债务跌至新低，因为这家奢侈品零售商在销售下滑和供应商关系陷入困境的情况下，将在本月底面临支付 1 亿多美元利息的最后期限。【原文：Saks Global Enterprises’ debt has sunk to new lows in recent days as the luxury retailer faces a more than $100 million interest payment deadline at the end of the month amid sales declines and troubled vendor relationships.】

item.title: 特朗普削减资金引发投资者焦虑，医院小额贷款发展滞后
item.description: 债券投资者对美国医院出售的债务越来越警惕，他们认为联邦医疗资金的削减迫在眉睫，这对一个刚刚开始从大流行病压力中恢复的行业来说是新的痛点。【原文：Bond investors have been increasingly wary of debt sold by US hospitals, and they see looming cuts to federal health-care funding as new pain points for an industry that’s just starting to recover from pandemic stress.】

item.title: 富达债券老将奥尼尔计划退休，他已退休 36 年
item.description: 福特-奥尼尔（Ford O'Neil）是富达投资公司（Fidelity Investments）的长期固定收益经理，他计划明年辞去投资组合管理职务，结束自己 36 年的职业生涯，帮助打造业内最大的债券专营公司之一。【原文：Ford O’Neil, a longtime Fidelity Investments fixed-income manager, plans to step down from his portfolio -management duties next year, capping a 36-year career that helped shape one of the industry’s largest bond franchises.】

item.title: 北极风暴将给美国中部电网带来压力，并给纽约市带来小雪
item.description: 美国中部地区的公用事业部门正严阵以待，迎接本周末可能导致供暖需求飙升并可能给纽约市带来降雪的寒冷天气。【原文：Utilities across the central US are bracing for a blast of cold weather that’s likely to send heating demand soaring this weekend — and potentially coat New York City with snow.】

item.title: 马斯克的 X 汽车公司在代价高昂的转型过程中实现销量增长
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的 X 公司在第三季度的销售额猛增，但这家社交网络公司仍在处理巨额成本问题，包括公司重组带来的成本。【原文：Sales at Elon Musk’s X jumped during the third quarter, but the social network is still dealing with significant costs — including from the firm’s restructuring — as the billionaire works to turn around the business he bought for $44 billion.】

item.title: 沃尔玛斥资 190 亿美元提升纳斯达克 100 指数的计划可能需要等待
item.description: 沃尔玛公司（Walmart Inc. ）本周放弃了纽约证券交易所，转投老对手纳斯达克，这标志着大证券交易所历史上最大的一次股票上市叛逃。【原文：Walmart Inc. ditched the New York Stock Exchange for arch-rival Nasdaq this week, marking the largest defection of a stock listing in the Big Board’s history.】

item.description: 芯片制造商博通公司（Broadcom Inc.【原文：The shares of companies exposed to artificial intelligence infrastructure came in for a beating after a report about Oracle Corp. data center delays added fuel to a selloff already underway following disappointing earnings results from chipmaker Broadcom Inc.】

item.title: 美联储购买国债有助于降低 10 年期国债收益率
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp.）的利率策略师表示，美联储购买国库券以维持银行系统内充足的现金水平，有可能抑制长期收益率。【原文：Federal Reserve purchases of Treasury bills to maintain adequate levels of cash in the banking system has the potential to restrain long-term yields, interest-rate strategists at Bank of America Corp. say.】

item.title: 维萨高管称 2026 年将是人工智能辅助购物年
item.description: Visa 公司的一位高管表示，明年人工智能辅助购物将变得更加普遍，因为支付公司和人工智能公司正在结成联盟，以塑造竞争日益激烈的格局。【原文：Artificial intelligence-assisted shopping will become more common next year, as alliances between payments and AI firms are forming to shape the increasingly competitive landscape, according to a Visa Inc. executive.】

item.title: 先锋股票量化公司称比特币目前仍是 "数字拉布布 "玩具
item.description: 先锋集团（Vanguard Group）现在可能允许客户交易现货比特币交易所交易基金，但该公司的一位高级投资领导人表示，其对加密货币的基本看法保持不变。【原文：Vanguard Group may now allow clients to trade spot Bitcoin exchange-traded funds, but one of the firm’s senior investment leaders says its underlying view of crypto remains unchanged.】
